content:
UI Components
Text to Image
Text to Speech
Additionally, Puter.js works in a way that every user of your app will cover their own costs, so whether you have 1 user or 1 million users, your app won't cost you anything to run. In other words, Puter.js gives your app infinitely scalable Cloud and AI for free. Puter.js is powered by [Puter](https://github.com/HeyPuter/puter), the open-source cloud operating system with a heavy focus on privacy. Puter does not use tracking technologies and does not monetize or even collect personal information.

Examples
